picked_headlines.summary: Optimizing small language models for e-commerce boosts efficiency and cuts costs.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article highlights the practical application of AI in e-commerce, showcasing how smaller models can match larger ones in accuracy while being cost-effective, appealing to both technical and business stakeholders.

picked_headlines.summary: FPGA-based real-time semantic segmentation for autonomous vehicles outperforms GPUs.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This piece presents a significant advancement in autonomous vehicle technology, demonstrating the potential of FPGA implementations in real-world engineering applications.

digest:
- *Decoder-Hybrid-Decoder Architecture for Efficient Reasoning with Long Generation*: SambaY improves efficiency in long-context reasoning tasks using GMUs. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.06607)
- *Vibration-Based Gesture Recognition on Furniture*: Energy-efficient FPGA implementation optimizes neural networks for real-world use. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.23156)
- *Addressing Corner Cases in Autonomous Driving*: WM-MoE enhances motion forecasting with world models and LLMs. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.21867)
- *TernaryCLIP*: Compresses vision-language models using ternary weights, achieving efficiency gains. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.21879)
- *Backward-Friendly Optimization*: GradLite cuts memory use by 50% while maintaining LLM performance. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.22467)
- *Policies over Poses*: MARL framework for multi-robot SLAM improves accuracy and efficiency. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.22740)
- *Transformer Based Linear Attention*: Achieves 3.3x speedup and 3.6x memory reduction over state-of-the-art. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.21956)
- *LightAgent*: Balances on-device efficiency with cloud capabilities for GUI agents. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.22009)
- *CustomIR*: Enhances dense embedding models for specific corpora using synthetic queries. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.21729)
- *GigaEmbeddings*: Efficient Russian text embeddings achieve state-of-the-art results. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.22369)
